featured.headline: OpenAI says 18 to 24-year-olds account for nearly 50% of ChatGPT usage in India
featured.summary: The company said on Friday that users between 18 and 24 years of age account for nearly 50% of all messages sent by Indians to ChatGPT, and users under 30 accounted for 80% of usage in the country. ...

secondary_1.headline: UAE’s G42 teams up with Cerebras to deploy 8 exaflops of compute in India

secondary_2.headline: General Catalyst commits $5B to India over five years
